api_list.name: FIFA All Matches
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fifa-football-player-team-stats-records-matches-api-data.p.rapidapi.com/fifa-match/v1/data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fifa-football-player-team-stats-records-matches-api-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
